titleStmt.title: Variety of news for all pallats, as certainties, probabilities, &c.
titleStmt.author: St. Serfe, Thomas, Sir, fl. 1668.

notesStmt.note: Two items have been signed John Dow, Mackermoch, and A. W. respectively, but the whole work has been attributed to Thomas St. Serfe.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
